content.18: The prediction mask of the SOFA class is quite rough and incomplete. The boundaries are not well-defined, and there are several areas where the SOFA region is missing in the prediction compared to the ground truth. The overall shape is captured, but with significant inaccuracies.

content.11: The prediction mask of the DININGTABLE region is quite accurate, but it is slightly over-extended towards the people sitting at the table. The boundary of the DININGTABLE is not as precise as in the ground truth.
content.15: The prediction mask of the PERSON region is quite accurate overall, but the boundaries are not well-defined, especially around the hands and the lower part of the bodies. The segmentation is also quite coarse, missing some details of the PERSON shape.

content.7: The prediction mask of the CAR region is quite chaotic, with several hallucinated areas appearing on the windshield and the side of the car. The ground truth CAR region is segmented much more precisely, with a clean boundary.
content.15: The prediction mask of the PERSON region is quite noisy and fragmented. It seems to be hallucinating parts of the PERSON, while missing other parts. The boundaries are also quite irregular and not well-defined. Overall, the prediction is not capturing the ground truth PERSON region accurately.

content.12: The prediction mask of the DOG region is quite rough and incomplete. The boundaries are not well-defined, and there are noticeable gaps in the segmentation, especially around the head and the lower part of the body. The ground truth DOG region is more accurately captured, with a smoother and more complete segmentation.
content.17: The prediction mask of the SHEEP region is quite fragmented, with several holes and missing parts compared to the ground truth. The boundary of the SHEEP is also not well-defined, with some areas incorrectly segmented as unlabelled. Overall, the prediction is not accurate in capturing the complete shape of the SHEEP.
